attributes.action: The Administration to declare Pakistan, State Sponsor of Terrorism
attributes.background: Pakistan is exporting terrorism globally. Pakistan Govt and Pakistan army and ISI supports and trains terrorist organisation and fund them. All would and countries like UK, EU, US, India and many other countries are victim of these shameful terrorist activities.

rejection.details:
“State Sponsors of Terrorism” is a designation used by the Department of State in the United States of America. This designation is not used in this way by the UK Government.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about Pakistan.
